data.title: Latest news on Metro UK
data.meta_description: The latest Jemima Khan news, blogs and videos on Metro
data.text:
The new ice bucket challenge? The best celebrity #wakeupcall selfies so far

Can someone nominate Benedict Cumberbatch please?

Hugh Grant ‘has third secret love child with Swedish TV boss’

British actor Hugh Grant has secretly become the father of a third lovechild, according to reports.

Russell Brand ‘ready to propose’ to Jemima Khan: ‘I really love her’

Russell Brand is hoping it’s second time lucky as he is believed to be ready to pop the question to Jemima Khan.

Russell Brand gets soppy over Jemima Khan’s dog Brian on The Jonathan Ross Show

Forget Jemima Khan, Russell Brand is totally in love with her adorable dog Brian.

It’s back on! Russell Brand makes no secret of rekindled romance with girlfriend Jemima Khan

It looks like ladies’ man Russell Brand is officially off the market after he was caught back in the arms of heiress Jemima Khan.

Jemima Khan gets the boot as Russell Brand declares: I’m single

Jemima Khan has been booted from Russell Brand’s bedroom.

George Galloway slams rumours he has converted to Islam

George Galloway has vehemently denied being converted to Islam following claims made in an article written by Jemima Khan.

Hugh Grant and Jemima Khan entitled to see phone hacking files, court rules

Hugh Grant and Jemima Khan are entitled to see police files containing details about the alleged hacking of their phones by tabloids, a judge has ruled.

Jemima Khan fears super-injunction ‘nightmare’ will see her son get bullied

Jemima Khan has revealed she fears for her 14-year-old son's safety at school after describing the 'nightmare' of being falsely linked on social networking site Twitter with a super-injunction preventing the publication of 'intimate' photos of her and Jeremy Clarkson.

Jemima ready to bat with Warne?

She certainly has a penchant for world class cricketers and Jemima Khan has sparked rumours she is ready to bat with another after a secret rendezvous with Australian spin bowler Shane Warne.

Jemima Khan receives death threats

Jemima Khan has received death threats from Islamic fundamentalists, she has revealed.

Stars unite to halt HIV spread among babies

Khans together for anti-Musharraf protest

Jemima joins Pakistan protest

Jemima Khan joined hordes of protesters outside the Pakistan High Commission in London to call for an end to the state of emergency and the release of all political prisoners.

Jemima’s fears for Imran

Jemima Khan has spoken of her fears following the arrest in Pakistan of her ex-husband, the former cricket star turned politician Imran Khan.

Jemima call over Pakistan aid

Socialite Jemima Khan has said Britain should suspend aid to Pakistan until democracy is restored.

Jemima: I fear for Imran

Jemima Khan spoke of her fears for her ex-husband Imran Khan, who is in hiding after escaping house arrest in Pakistan.
